Class SmartDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmartDevice
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartCamera, SmartLamp, SmartPlug

    public abstract class SmartDevice
extends java.lang.Object

    The SmartDevice class is the base class of all smart devices. It contains basic device control methods and properties.
